page.description: Populates the controls in a Dialog with data from a table.

argument.name: primaryKey
argument.description: The primary key corresponding to the record containing the data to load from the table.

argument.name: onCallbackCompleteCode
argument.description: Javascript code to execute when the callback is complete

argument.name: debugInfoLocation
argument.description: If not blank, name of the Placeholder control where debug info should be shown. Otherwise, default location is used.

page.discussion: If the primary key has multiple columns, use ||| (three pipes) to delimit the key values. You must have previously set the Data Binding properties on the Dialog.
